description:
We are excited to announce our June meetup which will be all around Leveraging Cloud Computing for Increased Sustainability.

We are aiming for the 22nd of June or the 29th of June and have a few speakers lined up so far.

This will be a panel event consisting of 3/4 speakers and a facilitator.

More details to follow soon!

RSVP to stay updated with more news and join the Slack channel to interact and chat with other community members! -
https://join.slack.com/t/bristol-cn-and-devops/shared_invite/zt-1um80612s-tl1cw9V0qnoIVdD6hypyLw
title: Leveraging Cloud Computing for Increased Sustainability
